synopsis.text: Shortly after stumbling upon a mysterious indoor garden and encountering a peculiar boy named Minato, Subaru's life takes an unexpected turn. She discovers her best friend, Aoi, is part of a magical group on a quest to collect alien engine fragments to help a small extraterrestrial being from the Pleiades star system return home. The little creature, known as a Pleiadian, is the president of their after-school club and has chosen Subaru as a potential new member. As Subaru joins the group, she learns that they are not the only ones in search of these fragments, making their mission even more challenging. This exciting and heartwarming anime follows the adventures of Subaru and her friends as they navigate the world of magic and friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
